content:
# Factorio Agent Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler (position -5.0, 2.5)
- Steam engine (position 0.5, 6.5)
- Connected with pipe network (positions -8.5,-0.5 to -5.5,0.5)
- Small electric pole (position 0.5, 3.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Operation at position (19.5, 74.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position 19.5, 74.5)
- Wooden chest for ore collection (position 19.5, 76.5)
- Two stone furnaces (positions 20.0, 78.0 and 23.0, 78.0)
- Inserters (positions 21.5, 78.5 and 24.5, 78.5)
- Output wooden chest (position 25.5, 78.5)
- Connected with power poles (positions 10.5,45.5 to 31.5,46.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Placement collision errors
- Check for existing entities before placing new ones, especially when using place_entity_next_to
- Increase spacing when placing adjacent entities to avoid collisions
- Consider different directions when placement fails in one direction

### Distance-related placement errors
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place entities (max placement distance is 10 tiles)
- Plan operations in local areas rather than trying to place entities far from current position

### Belt connection errors
- Transport belts cannot connect directly to furnaces - use inserters as intermediaries
- Ensure proper input/output orientation when connecting machines with belts

### Power connection issues
- Verify inserter is connected to power network before expecting it to function
- Check power pole placement to ensure full coverage of all electrical devices

### Operational warnings to address
- Empty full chests at mining drill drop positions to continue mining
- Provide input materials to furnaces to begin smelting operations
- Ensure inserters have valid pickup/drop positions and available items to transfer
